help-file.title: AGILITY
help-file.content: Agility is a measure of how coordinated you are overall; how well you handle movements of your whole body. It is the primary attribute of Rogue and Fighter type classes. For Thieves, it will enable them to have better chances with skills such as "Trip". For Fighters and Rogues, it will increase the rate at which they "Dodge" and "Parry" attacks.
